#summary CT Eureka
#labels Phase-Guide

= Quick Facts =
  * [http://conflictterra.googlecode.com/files/CT_Eurekav7.sd7 Download]
  * Supports up to 8 players
  * 16 x 16

= Description =
CT Eureka is a relatively open map that is broken up by small hills.  Pine trees dot the lowlands, and an occasional boulder gives a strong alpine feeling to the map.
